reviewtext: Do you own a 27 inch TV with a $27 DVD player?  Don't bother.  Do you own a $5000 amp, a $3000 DVD player, and a set of speakers that you might bury yourself in?  Don't bother buying, unless you want to burn money. Monster may look pretty, and the performance of Monster vs. no name is certainly proven in the quantifiable scientific analysis...but your ear can't hear it.Simply put, buy comparable cables with and without the Monster name and run a test with your ears.  You will probably find that you can save yourself significant $ by purchasing equally constructed cabling without the Monster name...
